name: Krowdthink Ltd
goal:
Developer of a privacy preserving, secure-by-design, location based mobile app for localised digital engagement.
Building counter-terror features into the platform as of end 2017.
Company also advocates human rights in the digital data context.
interests: Communication, Competition, Information Society, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and Technology
euInitiatives:
GDPR - General Data Protection regulation
E-Privacy and PECR (Privacy of Electronic Regulation)
Smart City - Citizen Engagement
